Package gui

package gui
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Display
    The Display interface contains the method needed to display a grid object.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AbstractDisplay
    This class provides common implementation code for drawing objects.
    ColorEditor
    A property editor for the Color type.
    DefaultDisplay
    The DefaultDisplay draws the object's text property with a background color given by the object's color property.
    DisplayMap
    DisplayMap is a collection that maps grid occupant classes to objects that know how to display them.
    FormLayout
    A layout manager that lays out components along a central axis
    This code is not tested on the AP CS A and AB exams.
    ImageDisplay
    An ImageDisplay displays an object as a tinted image from an image file whose name matches the class name.
    LocationEditor
    A property editor for the Location type.
    MenuMaker<T>
    Makes the menus for constructing new occupants and grids, and for invoking methods on existing occupants.
    RatBotsArena
    The Arena class includes all of the methods needed to setup the arena according to the rules of the game.
    RatBotsColorAssigner
    The ColorAssigner class is a utility that keeps track of colors used in the game.
    RatBotsColorScheme
     
    RatBotsGridPanel
    A GridPanel is a panel containing a graphical display of the grid occupants.
    RatBotsGUIController<T>
    The GUIController controls the behavior in a WorldFrame.
    RatBotsScoreBoard
     
    RatBotsWorldFrame<T>
    The WorldFrame displays a World and allows manipulation of its occupants.
